system.description: When exposed to at least 1 hour of sunlight, a blood vine grows 10 feet per day, to a maximum size of 200 feet. For each 10 feet in size, a blood vine is LV 1 and HP 9. * It can make 1 bite ATK at LV 1 and gains an additional bite ATK at LVs 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20. Its ATK roll is equal to its LV.
